Exceeded the number of followers of our page on Twitter 3 million followers .. And Facebook 2 million followers .. And one million followers on Instagram and Google Plus
I would like to thank all the observers and appreciation to all those who interact with us with new observations, proposals and ideas
Social media changed perceptions, opened doors, dropped barriers, developed work and made the public part of development
I can say that the means of social communication today has become a powerful force .. And an open parliament .. And a flag can not be circumvented
My social media followers exceeded 3M on Twitter, 2M on Facebook and 1M on both Instagram and Google+
I extend my thanks to all followers and to everyone interacting with us through providing new comments, suggestions & ideas.
Social media channels created new opportunities, removed all barriers & made the audience part of our development plans.
Having a magnificent influence, today social media channels serve as an open parliament and can not be ignored or misled.
